text: Have you seen any issues/problems with real estate/-construction companies that uses alot of 3D, interactivity etc with the CMS Hub/-integrations? Curious if theres any examples out there that build and sell homes.
Does anyone know if there's a way to have a website restore from a backup?  Support seems clueless on this.  We replicated a single template file and it hosed 90 pages on a site
Hey Ian, are you in the community group for custom quotes template beta?

Hi HubSpoters looking for some guidance:
Use case -
 We like using Richtext editors in our modules, but want to prevent the user from changing the font sizes ( eg H1, H1 or P ) or getting in the Advanced functionality
 We would like them to have the functionality of changing individual text colors etc

Considerations:
 Is it possible to disabled font-sizes and advanced functionally to prevent the user/client from make typography edits?

Any feedback would be really appreciated.
Thanks
